job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines: Ontwerpen, bouwen en onderhouden van data pipelines op ons Snowflake platform, die onze Tableau-rapportages voeden via een semantische laag.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines, which is the core definition of Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Generatieve AI: Overdracht en doorontwikkeling van projecten zoals de GenAI Suite en de Klus Coach (een generatieve AI-assistent voor klanten).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to Generative AI projects (GenAI Suite, Klus Coach) and their further development, indicating involvement in modeling or adapting generative AI systems.

While Dataiku can involve modeling, managing its projects often includes aspects of integrating and maintaining these projects within a broader workflow, aligning with software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Linux serverbeheer: Verantwoordelijkheid voor het onderhouden van een Linux-omgeving die cruciaal is voor onze AI-infrastructuur.
job_tasks.justification: Managing server environments, especially those critical for AI infrastructure, falls under operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met ons data science team, de IT-afdeling en verschillende business units om schaalbare oplossingen te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates collaboration with various business units to deliver solutions, implying an understanding of business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met ons data science team, de IT-afdeling en verschillende business units

classification.rationale: The job explicitly mentions Generative AI projects (GenAI Suite, Klus Coach) and their development. While there's a strong Data Engineering component, the focus on 'Generatieve AI' and the specific mention of developing AI assistants points towards a GenAI Engineer role.
